definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: marry, rule over (cf. Ar. ba9ala = own, possess, esp. a wife or concubine; Eth. ba9ala: to be rich, As. bâlu, rule COT:Gloss, Aram. [[בְּעַל]] take possession of wife or concubine)—
marry Ge 20:3 (E) De 21:13, De 22:22, De 24:1, Is 54:1, Is 54:5, Is 62:4, Is 62:5, Is 62:5, Mal 2:11; sq. [[בְּ]] Je 3:14, Je 31:32 be lord (husband) over.
